name: Q&K International Group Limited
description: Q&K International Group Limited is an innovative technology-driven company specializing in the short-term rental market in China. Founded in 2017, Q&K focuses on providing affordable and high-quality accommodation solutions for travelers and business professionals. The company utilizes advanced technology to streamline the rental process, ensuring a seamless experience for users. Q&K operates a comprehensive platform that connects property owners with renters, offering a wide variety of listings ranging from cozy apartments to spacious villas. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, Q&K has rapidly expanded its presence across major cities in China, catering to a growing demand for flexible living arrangements. The company’s mission is to transform the way people experience travel and living, leveraging technology to enhance both the guest experience and the operational efficiency of property owners. Q&K is continuously investing in its platform to incorporate innovative features such as AI-driven recommendations and enhanced security measures, ensuring that both guests and hosts can engage with confidence. As the short-term rental market evolves, Q&K aims to remain at the forefront, providing exceptional service and fostering a community of users who value convenience and quality in their travel accommodations.

seo.meta_title: Q&K International Group Limited | Short-Term Rentals in China
seo.meta_description: Explore Q&K International Group Limited, a leader in the short-term rental market in China. Discover affordable accommodations and innovative technology solutions.

faq.question: What does Q&K specialize in?
faq.answer: Q&K specializes in short-term rentals and technology solutions for the hospitality industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Q&K?
faq.answer: Jing Wang is the CEO of Q&K International Group Limited.

faq.question: Where is Q&K headquartered?
faq.answer: Q&K is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: What types of properties does Q&K offer?
faq.answer: Q&K offers a variety of properties including apartments, villas, and unique stays.
